data.title: Disaster Risk Reduction Knowledge Service
data.meta_description:
Comoros, known as the country of the moon and the country of spices, 
it is an island country in Africa on the Indian Ocean,locate...,Comoros
data.text:
Comoros, known as the country of the moon and the country of spices, it is an island country in Africa on the Indian Ocean,located at the entrance of the northern end of the Mozambique Strait in the east of Africa. It is about 300 kilometers away from Madagascar and Mozambique in the East and West. The great Comoros Island, Anjouan Island, Mohéli and Mayotte Island, which make up the Comoros, are known as the four pearls in the West Indian Ocean.

The main territory of Comoros are three volcanic islands: Grand Comoros, Mohéli and Anjouan.

Comoros is one of the poorest countries in the world, agriculture is the pillar of the country's economy, its transportation system is also backward, the population is young and growing rapidly, which also lacks natural resources.
